sentences.english: The two of them to some topic, talk is also speculation.

sentences.english: Therefore, all the people involved can be divided into Speculative Group and Investment Group.
sentences.chinese: 因此所有参与买卖的人可分为投机集团和投资集团。

sentences.english: Speculators, betting that the yuan will appreciate, are buying it with weakening greenbacks.
sentences.chinese: 打赌人民币升值的投机者用疲软的美元购买人民币。

sentences.english: Do you confuse speculating with investing?
sentences.chinese: 你是否混同了投机和投资？

sentences.english: They met at hte party and clicked right away.
sentences.chinese: 他们在派对上认识，马上就说话投机了。

sentences.english: Venture capital transmogrified into speculative fever.
sentences.chinese: 风险资本改头换面进入投机热。

sentences.english: Once again, opportunistic Imperial warlords pounced .
sentences.chinese: 善于投机的帝国军阀再度崛起。

sentences.english: The speculative market is like the tail wagging the dog.
sentences.chinese: 投机市场就像狗尾巴一样摇晃。

sentences.english: Speculators eager to earn a fast buck often wind up in bankruptcy.
sentences.chinese: 急于想发横财的投机者到头来往往破产。

sentences.english: After all why to come to know Chinese stock market at present high congeniality woollen cloth?

sentences.english: He was a sinister and crafty speculator.
sentences.chinese: 他是一个险诈的投机商。

sentences.english: He made his money speculating on the London gold and silver markets.
sentences.chinese: 他在伦敦黄金市场和白银市场上进行投机买卖。

sentences.english: A certain degree of speculation should not only be allowed but also necessary.
sentences.chinese: 一定程度的房地产投机不但应该允许，而且是必要的。

sentences.english: Speculators Õ too believe Treasury yields will rise in the near term.
sentences.chinese: 投机者也相信短期美国国债收益率将会上升。

sentences.english: Land speculators tried to defraud him of his savings.
sentences.chinese: 土地投机商们企图骗取他的存款。

sentences.english: Fast-money traders are selling as they are stopped out of short-term positions.
sentences.chinese: 投机者在抛售，是因为他们正从短期头寸脱身。
